timeline.message:
[doc] Update versions missed during release

Removed old script bin/utils/release_version_update_docs.sh to avoid
confusion. New script solves issues of not "globally" replacing.

New script is at:

bin/utils/release/release_version_update_docs.sh
Include _all_ doc scripts in update scripts
Update Gradle Plugin README with correct version

timeline.bodyText: @jimschubert FYI. I intentionally left this one since I want to show how to install an old version instead of the latest version but I'm ok showing whatever version (latest or old) in the doc.
timeline.author: wing328
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -393,10 +393,10 @@ openapi-generator version
 ```
 
 <!-- RELEASE_VERSION -->
-Or install a particular OpenAPI Generator version (e.g. v4.2.2):
+Or install a particular OpenAPI Generator version (e.g. v4.2.3):

replies.bodyText: K. If that's the intent, please change and remove the RELEASE_VERSION markers around the section. Although, I think users could infer this applies for all versions.
replies.author: jimschubert
